duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead projects related to regulatory compliance or improving facility or enterprise process/procedures.
Develop comprehensive programs for facilities across a division or enterprise.
Monitor performance reports for trends, conditions, and recommendations for improvement.

education_certification.credential: 5-8 years of regulatory knowledge and practical experience with hazardous materials, Process Safety Management, and fire and electrical safety. Experience in quantitative/qualitative risk assessments and process hazards analysis in siting hazardous material related projects. CPS, CHMM, PE and NFPA 70E certifications a plus.
